resources.string: UoPeople Campus 2 is a free and open-source project that act as a portal to the UoPeople Moodle site. Anyone can edit/modify and redistribute the app with the same GPL-v3 or any GPL-v3 compatible licence.\n Thanks for using the App.

This open-source app shows ads to fund the development of the project. To not annoy our users, Ads are limited to maximum of two ads per hour. If you are still annoyed or want no ads to be shown, you can turn it off below.
